snippet: Allyson Felix and Jeneba Tarmoh will race Monday to determine who will claim the final spot to represent the United States in the women’s 100 meters at the Olympics.
abstract: Sprinters Allyson Felix and Jeneba Tarmoh agree to compete in runoff to determine who will claim the third and final spot to represent the United States in the women’s 100 meters at the 2012 Olympics.

byline.original: By MARY PILON and KEN BELSON

lead_paragraph: Allyson Felix and Jeneba Tarmoh will race Monday to determine who will claim the final spot to represent the United States in the women’s 100 meters at the Olympics.

headline.seo: Sprinters Agree on Runoff to Determine Olympic Berth
headline.main: Sprinters Agree on Runoff to Determine Olympic Berth
headline.print_headline: Two Sprinters Agree to Runoff For Olympic Spot
